set_wallet_name_text: CKBull has been created prioritizing the security of your assets. Please read the following security tips carefully to keep your funds safe and follow the recommended steps.
advise1_text: CKBull is a non-custodial wallet, this means that your assets are in the Nervos network, not in CKBull. Only you can access your private key whether it is generated by CKBull or imported from another wallet. Therefore, the CKBull team cannot recover your account if you make a mistake or lose your private keys and we cannot reverse your transactions if you make a mistake as they are irreversible.
advise2_text: CKBull is just a client application. This means that your CKB and other assets are not found in the application, but in the Nervos network. Only you with your private key can access the funds and only you are responsible for keeping it safe and offline. Write several copies of your mnemonic on a piece of paper and store it in different physical locations.
advise3_text: When you change your phone you will have to re-import your mnemonics to access your accounts. No one from CKBull or Nervos will ever ask you for your private keys or mnemonics. If someone asks you or tells you to enter these keys somewhere else, you are being scammed.
receive_info: CKBull picks a new receiving address for better privacy.
mnemonic_input_text: Type a word and press space or enter to add it or tap one to remove it.
send_confirmation_text:
Careful, transactions cannot be undone.
Take your time to verify the information.
deposit_warning: Nervos DAO needs {{dao_min_deposit}} CKBytes for deposit cell storage, which is not compensation-bearing. Please visit the Nervos DAO RFC for more information about Nervos DAO.
deposit_summary_warning: Deposit may take a while to be locked and completly functional. You'll be able to follow the process in the Deposit list
delete_data_text: Are you sure you want to delete all the data from this device? You'll be asked for your PIN in order to do so.
backup_wallet_advise_text: If you continue you will see your recovery phrase for one of your wallets. This is your only key to that wallet. If your device gets stolen or lost, you will only be able to recover your funds with this recovery phrase.
not_enough_balance_for_fees: Not enough balance to pay the fees
delete_wallet_text: Are you sure you want to delete {{walletName}} from this device? You'll be asked for your PIN in order to do so.
delete_only_wallet_text: Are you sure you want to delete {{walletName}} from this device? This will also erase your other data, as {{walletName}} is your only wallet. You'll be asked for your PIN in order to do so.
pending_transaction_text: You have an uncommitted transaction. Please, wait until it is committed to send a new one.
can_add_account: You can add an account by importing a private key. You can also create an account from scratch
start_receiving_nfts: To start seeing NFTs, send NFTs to your wallet's address.
start_receiving_tokens: To start seeing tokens, send tokens to your wallet's address.
start_making_transactions: To start using CKBull, send CKBs, tokens or NFTs to your wallet address and unleash the power of the Nervos network.
start_creating_deposits: To create your first deposit send some CKB to the Nervos DAO and start earning rewards.
withdraw_explanation: Remember that each deposit period is 180 epochs (~30 days) starting from the time of your deposit.
rejectTransactionDescription: Are you sure you want to reject this transaction? This action cannot be undone.
rejectConnectionDescription: Are you sure you want to reject this connection? This action cannot be undone.
disconnectDAppConfirmation: By disconnecting your account, you will no longer be able to use this dApp.
orderCompletedText: Remember that it will take a few minutes for your account balance to reflect the new amount.
